# gitea_user (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an existing Gitea user.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) The numeric ID of the user to look up. Either `username` or `id` must be specified.
- `username` (String) The username of the user to look up. Either `username` or `id` must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `active` (Boolean) Whether the user account is active.
- `avatar_url` (String) URL to the user's avatar image.
- `created` (String) The timestamp when the user account was created.
- `description` (String) The user's bio/description.
- `email` (String) The user's email address.
- `followers_count` (Number) The number of followers the user has.
- `following_count` (Number) The number of users this user is following.
- `full_name` (String) The user's full display name.
- `html_url` (String) URL to the user's Gitea profile page.
- `is_admin` (Boolean) Whether the user is a Gitea administrator.
- `language` (String) The user's preferred language/locale.
- `last_login` (String) The timestamp of the user's last login.
- `location` (String) The user's location.
- `login` (String) The user's login name (same as `username`).
- `login_name` (String) The identifier provided by an external authenticator (if configured).
- `prohibit_login` (Boolean) Whether the user is prohibited from logging in.
- `restricted` (Boolean) Whether the user has restricted permissions.
- `source_id` (Number) The ID of the user's authentication source.
- `starred_repos_count` (Number) The number of repositories the user has starred.
- `visibility` (String) The user's visibility level (`public`, `limited`, or `private`).
- `website` (String) The user's website URL.
